title: Me Before You
description: a heartfelt romantic drama about a young woman who becomes a caregiver for a wealthy, paralyzed man, and their unexpected bond changes both of their lives forever.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: You really don't enjoy sarcasm, do you?

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: Let me know if you need anything.

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: I don't really like those kinds of films.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: What, did your school not teach you to read?

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: Watch this with me. that's an order.

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: Yeah, no, I get it, being there, gave their lives more meaning, but that's ....

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: Well, to sacrifice themselves like that.

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: I mean, could you even imagine?

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: Oh, if you're laughing at me, I swear to God I'll push you out of that chair.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: I am not laughing at you.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: The sky is clearing. Shall we get some air?

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: I am just amazed that you could reach the ripe old age of,, what?

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: 26, and never have watched a film with subtitles.

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: Oh, Well, I'm just amazed that you've reached the ripe old age of 31, without being locked in a cupboard for being such a snob.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: I've got a soft spot for 'Armageddon', with Bruce Willis, oil driller, has to save the world from an asteroid. And he does.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: So, What do you do with yourself when you are not here, Louisa Clark?

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: I uh, spend time with my family and I um, go to the pub.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: But you don't run with him?

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: I am not exactly built for it.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: This is an impressive list of hobbies.

dialogues.speaker: Louisa Clark
dialogues.en: I go to work, and I go home and that's it.

dialogues.speaker: Will Traynor
dialogues.en: Wow, your life's even duller than mine.
